name: TetrisSwitch
author: Ryuzaki-MrL
description:
It's freaking Tetris, but anyway:

(<) / (>): move tetromino
Hold (Down): soft drop (fast drop)
(Up): hard drop (instant drop)
(A) / (B): rotate
(X): change grid color
(L) / (R): hold tetromino
(+): pause; start over (after game over)
(-): quit game (while paused)
